participant_1.background:
I have an old piano in my living room that I like to play when the mood strikes.
i haven t done anything since high school.
My comic book collection was stolen from my apartment when I was away on vacation.
I'm proud of my ability to enjoy my free time.
my doctor told me i have six months to live.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy listening to Jason Mraz's music to help me cope with the loss of my parents.
I wake up early and drink a glass of water to hydrate my body.
i am an middle school teacher for 8th grade.
i love to read harry potter books.
i am a veteran.

content.text: Hey, I'm sorry to hear about your parents.
Thanks, it's been a tough year.
What do you like to do to relax?
I listen to Jason Mraz, read Harry Potter, or wake up early and drink a glass of water to hydrate my body.
What kind of music do you like?
I like Jason Mraz because his music is upbeat and makes me feel good.
I like to play the piano when I'm feeling stressed.
That's a great way to relax! I used to play the piano, but I haven't played in a while.
You should get back into it! It's a great way to relieve stress.
I might do that. I used to love playing the piano.
What's your favorite book?
I love Harry Potter. I'm an 8th grade teacher and I have my students read the series every year.
That's awesome! I used to read the series when I was younger.
It's such a great series. I love the characters and the story.
I agree. It's a classic for a reason.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I really enjoy historical fiction.
I've never read any historical fiction, but I've heard good things about it.
You should give it a try! There are a lot of great historical fiction books out there.
I might do that. Thanks for the recommendation.
You're welcome!
